resources.string: Please grant the following permissions to use Road Ruler.
Road Ruler requires these permissions to track your driving miles.
Please select \'Allow all the time\' on the following permission screen to use Road Ruler.\n\nRoad Ruler will NOT WORK without this permission.

Selecting \'Allow all the time\' allows Road Ruler to track your driving miles in the background while you use your other apps, or even if you close the Road Ruler app. Road Ruler will NOT WORK without this permission.\n\nPlease go to the app settings for Road Ruler and select \'Allow all the time\' from the Permissions->Location screen
You must grant the physical activity permission for Road Ruler to operate correctly.
Road Ruler is tracking your mileage.
